info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Salle and southwestern Grundy Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 321 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grand Ridge, or near Streator, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Streator, Marseilles, Seneca, Grand Ridge, Ransom, Verona and Kinsman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
